title: Finding Annevra
description: Somewhere out there...A girl is born with the ability to see beyond.A boy is born and grows up in the shadow of his deceased father, tasked with looking after his father’s weird artifact collection.The two have met, long ago. They meet again, just as one of the artifacts goes missing.The girl is an outcast. The boy is golden, or at least he was supposed to be.She wants to help, but it means revealing her deepest secret, and she isn’t sure she’s up to that. Plus, the time has come for plenty of other secrets to unveil themselves.The horrors of the past have waited long enough for the girl and boy to be ready.They descend like an avalanche.
author: Josephine C. Lieder
